input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product features and product name.

Product name:
Save Money! Foaming Hand Soap / Sanitizer Dispenser Three Pack Empty Plastic Clear Bottle White Pumps 250mL 8 oz. For Dr. Bronner's Pure Castile Magic Castile Soap Concentrate Add Essential Oil

Product features:
Save Money With My Plastic Empty Foaming Hand Soap Dispenser For Castile Soap Concentrates.
Made in the USA!!!
How to use: Dilute four parts water to one part soap concentrate and save big money!!!
For use with soap concentrates such as Dr. Bronner's and Dr. Woods
Plastic Soap Dispenser, Bpa Free: PETE bottle and Polypropylene Pump

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This adjustable sign holder is the perfect way to display your signs. The black, double-sided adjustable sign holder holds a printed 8.5" x 11" sign. Simply insert your sign between the non-glare lenses! The adjustable sign holder has a height range of 26" to 37.1" and features a shovel base that is flat. This sign holder is a great option for any store, restaurant, office, or event!
input_text.Response B:
Save Money With My Plastic Empty Foaming Hand Soap Dispenser For Castile Soap Concentrates. For use with soap concentrates such as Dr. Bronner's and Dr. Woods. Made in the USA!!! This plastic soap dispenser, bpa free: PETE bottle and Polypropylene Pump, is a great way to save money with my plastic empty foaming hand soap dispenser for castile soap concentrates. Dilute four parts water to one part soap concentrate and save big money!!! It is easy to use, just pour the concentrate into the bottle, fill the rest with water, and pump until foam appears.

Dr. Bronner's Pure Castile Magic Soap Concentrate is an all-purpose soap concentrate that can be used for cleaning, washing, and bathing. It is made from natural ingredients and is free from harsh chemicals and synthetic fragrances. This concentrate is perfect for those who are looking for a more natural and organic way to clean and care for their skin and home.

The dispenser is easy to use, just pour the concentrate into the bottle, fill the rest with water, and pump until foam appears. It is made from PETE bottle and Polypropylene Pump, which are both BPA-free materials. The dispenser is designed to be refilled and reused, so you can save money and reduce waste.

The dispenser is also easy to clean, just fill it with warm water and a drop of dish soap, and then pump the dispenser to clean it.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is for the wrong product. Response B is too long.
